title: How to retrain & it keeps displaying snapshot-# is not in all_model_checkpoint_paths.
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**
Anaconda Env & DeepLabCut 2.0

**Describe the problem**
I cannot understand how to retrain. In https://github.com/AlexEMG/DeepLabCut/blob/master/docs/functionDetails.md#i-video-analysis-and-plotting-results, I found that I should fix init_weight, but I don't know how should I fix. I tried to change init_weights to 
C:\Users\user\Desktop\LinearChamber-KAIST-2018-11-19\dlc-models\iteration-0\LinearChamberNov19-trainset95shuffle1\train\snapshot-1000,
But it doesn't work and my kernel dead(I made snapshot-1000 folder and put all snapshot-1000 related 3 files-snapshot-1000.index, snapshot-1000.meta, snapshot-1000.data-00000-of-00001) .
I feel init_weights should be changed changed to some ~.ckpt file but I can't find any ~.ckpt file in the C:\Users\user\Desktop\LinearChamber-KAIST-2018-11-19\dlc-models\iteration-0\LinearChamberNov19-trainset95shuffle1\train folder.
Could you let me know how to retrain?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16134605/49134347-9cd03e00-f326-11e8-81b4-4ae4b7d748cf.png)

And I got this message again and again.. may I know where is all_model_checkpoint_paths please? I can't find the variable in any deeplabcut files..

**How to Reproduce the problem**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. train to 1000 and snapshot of 1000 made in train folder
2. change init_weights in pose_cfg.yaml to C:\Users\user\Desktop\LinearChamber-KAIST-2018-11-19\dlc-models\iteration-0\LinearChamberNov19-trainset95shuffle1\train\snapshot-1000,make snapshot-1000 folder in train folder, put 3 snapshot files in it
4. train to 2000 and my kernel dead
